tasks.label: Start GitHub self-hosted runner
tasks.detail: Prompts for owner/repo and runner token, then starts the docker-compose stack in github-self-hosted-runner-docker

tasks.label: Restart GitHub self-hosted runner (start if stopped)
tasks.detail: Restarts the runner containers if running, otherwise prompts for owner/repo and token and starts them
args: & { Set-Location -Path "${workspaceFolder}/github-self-hosted-runner-docker"; $ps = (docker-compose ps -q) -join ""; if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($ps)) { $env:GITHUB_REPOSITORY="${input:ownerRepo}"; $env:GITHUB_TOKEN="${input:runnerToken}"; $env:GITHUB_URL="${input:githubUrl}"; docker-compose up -d } else { docker-compose restart } }

inputs.description: Enter the GitHub runner registration token
GitHub URL (use https://github.com or your enterprise URL)
